## Overview

1. Review Homework

1. Working with strings (regex-free)
    - `paste()`
    - `str_trim()`
    - `str_detect()`
    - `str_count()`
    - `str_extact()`
    - `str_remove()`

1. Regular Expressions
    - regexplain
    - or `|`
    - groups `(apple) (banana)`

    - backslashes
